item.title: A powerful tool for operating Baidu Cloud Disk under Linux
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Recently, I have been deploying private SAAS products on the customer side. Since the customer’s on-site network cannot access the Internet, the data can only be transferred through the Linux jump server. In addition to the k8s offline deployment program and image, there are also hundreds of GB of video data that have been cut, so it can only be transferred through Baidu Cloud Disk. Imagine whether it is possible
